# Social (Third party / OAuth 2.0 / SAML) login with SuperTokens

## Features

- Sign-up / Sign-in with OAuth 2.0 (Like google, facebook etc..) and SAML providers <br/>
- Secure session management <br/>
- Email verification <br/>
- Multi-tenancy

<!-- COPY SECTION -->
<!-- ./thirdpartyemailpassword/introduction.mdx -->
<!-- 1 -->

### Built-in providers for Social Login

- Apple
- Discord
- Facebook
- Github
- Google
- LinkedIn

### Built-in providers for multi-tenant SSO

- Active Directory
- Google Workspaces
- Okta

## Demo application

- See our [live demo app](https://^{docsLinkRecipeName}.demo.supertokens.com/)
- Generate a starter app
    ```bash
    npx create-supertokens-app@latest --recipe=^{docsLinkRecipeName}
    ```
